mapper.select: SELECT c2.* FROM( SELECT c1.*,ROWNUM as rnum FROM(SELECT * FROM jet_board_m_cs ORDER BY jet_board_m_cs_no DESC)c1)c2 WHERE c2.rnum >= (#{page_num}-1)*10+1 AND c2.rnum <= #{page_num}*10
SELECT * FROM JET_board_m_cs ORDER BY jet_board_m_cs_no DESC
SELECT * FROM jet_board_m_cs WHERE jet_board_m_cs_title LIKE '%' || #{search_word} || '%' ORDER BY jet_board_m_cs_no DESC
SELECT * FROM jet_board_m_cs WHERE jet_board_m_cs_content LIKE '%' || #{search_word} || '%' ORDER BY jet_board_m_cs_no DESC
SELECT c.* FROM jet_board_m_cs c , jet_Member m WHERE m.jet_member_no = c.jet_member_no AND m.jet_member_nick LIKE '%' || #{search_word} || '%' ORDER BY jet_board_m_cs_no DESC
